Package messaging

Messaging holds all request and reply classes used in identifying RMI operations and all serializing.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BuyReply
    BuyReply holds the purchase transaction result.
    BuyRequest
    BuyRequest is just a distinguishable empty request to a cart.
    ConsultReply
    Replies with the list of payments the client has made in the bank.
    ConsultRequest
    ConsultRequest needs only the bank remote reference and a client id.
    ObjReply
    ObjReply contains the remote reference of the object needed.
    ObjRequest
    ObjRequest is an abstract class taking a gettable RemoteObj that is to be included in the specific request.
    PurchaseReply
    Purchase Reply just indicates operation success.
    PurchaseRequest
    Purchase Request takes the payment to synchronize in the bank.
    RegisterReply
    Register reply is a simple reply to a naming service registration, with a success indication.
    RegisterRequest
    RegisterRequest encapsulates a request to send to a naming service.
    SReply
    Reply which contains a boolean indicating operation success.

Package messaging Description

Messaging holds all request and reply classes used in identifying RMI operations and all serializing.
